body.bibl: Kitchen, Robert A. “I, Mêmrâ: This Is the Story Talking Personification of Literary Genre in Jacob of Sarug.” In Symposium Syriacum XII: Held at St Lawrence College, Rome 19–21 August 2016. Organized by the Pontifical Oriental Institute on the Occasion of the Centenary Celebration (1917–2017), edited by Emidio Vergani and Sabino Chialà, 319–28. Orientalia Christiana Analecta 311. Roma: Pontificio Istituto Orientale, 2022.
